means: 参政权扩大论者，妇女政权论者

sentence.Network_en: Margaret Mitchell was also a notable suffragist.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛格丽特米切尔同时也是一位著名的妇女政权论者。

entry.tran: (尤指在妇女没有选举权的社会中)主张妇女拥有选举权的人，主张妇女参政主义者
entry.def: A suffragist is a person who is in favour of women having the right to vote, especially in societies where women are not allowed to vote.

means.word_mean: 1. an advocate of the extension of voting rights (especially to women)
